section.title: Economy Package
section.p: Includes round-trip airfare, 3-star accommodation in Rome, and a guided tour of the Colosseum. Budget-friendly dining options and free museum entry on select days.

section.title: Mid-range Package
section.p: Includes round-trip airfare, 4-star hotel in Florence, tickets to the Uffizi Gallery, and a guided wine tour in Tuscany. Dining at family-run trattorias.

section.title: Luxury Package
section.p: First-class airfare, 5-star villa stay in the Amalfi Coast, private tours of historical landmarks, and fine dining experiences across Italy.
